CustomField.formula: IF( OR ( $User.Id = Owner.Id, $User.Id = Apps_Owner__r.Id, $User.Email = Bid_Manager__r.Email__c, $User.Email = Bid_Champion__r.Email__c, $User.Email = Solution_Architect__r.Email__c, $User.Email = Delivery_Manager__r.Email__c ) ,1,0)
CustomField.label: Apps$UserBidResponsibility
